metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3474 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability inhorizon/static/horizon/js/horizon.instances.js in the Launch Instance menuin OpenStack Dashboard (Horizon) before 2013.2.4, 2014.1 before 2014.1.2,and Juno before Juno-2 allows remote authenticated users to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via a network name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3474` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openstack-dashboard - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
openstack-dashboard-ubuntu-theme - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
python-django-horizon - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
python-django-openstack - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: horizon package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1').
